title: APPLY_DAMAGE Operation
description: Applies direct damage to a specific part of an entity, updating its health, handling thresholds/status labels, and dispatching events.

entity_ref.description: Reference to the target entity (the creature/character). Can be a string or JSON Logic.

part_ref.description: Reference to the specific body part entity. Optional. If missing, logic will attempt to resolve a hit location. Can be a string or JSON Logic.

damage_entry.description: Full damage entry object from weapon's damage_capabilities component. Preferred over legacy amount/damage_type parameters.

damage_multiplier.description: Optional multiplier applied to damage_entry.amount (and legacy amount). Must be non-negative. Defaults to 1.

exclude_damage_types.description: Array of damage type names to skip. If the damage_entry's name matches any value, the damage is not applied. Can be a direct array or JSON Logic expression that resolves to an array.

amount.description: DEPRECATED: Use damage_entry instead. Amount of damage to apply. Required only when not using damage_entry.

damage_type.description: DEPRECATED: Use damage_entry instead. Type of damage (e.g., 'blunt', 'piercing', 'slashing'). Required only when not using damage_entry.
